content:
I am an Assistant Professor of Economics in the Department of Economics at the Shippensburg University of Pennsylvania. I am an applied economist. My research includes health, energy, and public/regional economics.
I am teaching Managerial Economics and Regional Economics in spring 2022. In addition, I have taught Economic Analysis of Big Data, Principles of Economics, Principles of Macroeconomics, Managerial Economics, Business Data Visualization, and Elementary Business & Economic Statistics.
For any questions about my research or other scholarly activities, please contact me by email sshakya@ship.edu. You can also reach me on Twitter @econshishir.

title: Shishir Shakya
